tool_description: Convert modern day English phrases to Old English, the language of the Anglo-Saxons.
title: Old English Translator

api_list.name: Translate to Old English

required_parameters.name: X-FunTranslations-Api-Secret
required_parameters.description: API Key ( Get yours here : http://funtranslations.com/api/oldenglish )

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Text to convert to old English.
required_parameters.default: A hearty meal, a happy laughter is all we need.
